laboratory_examinations.findings: 290 pg/ml (normal value, 200 pg/ml) - Mild elevation in one relative
Abnormal mRNA of greater size (829 bp) in mutated MEN1 gene than normal transcript (629 bp). Confirmed existence of unspliced intron 9 in mature mRNA.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Normal fragment (629 bp) and an additional fragment (829 bp) in an affected subject (II-5).
